column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Impressive and five star worthy even before they opened the Modern Wing last May
column2: the Art Institute could easily keep anyone entertained for a day.  It's the second largest art museum in the country
column3: behind NYC's Metropolitan Museum of Art
column4: so plan accordingly.  There's truly something for everyone who appreciates any type of art from any period of time and any part of the world.  It even offers a breathtaking view of Millennium Park
column5: where you can find even more art.
